  • Classes in com.helger.schematron.pure.validation used by com.helger.schematron.pure.bound 
    Class and Description
    AbstractPSPartialValidationHandler
    An extension of PSValidationHandlerDefault that is used to determine the overall validity of a Schematron validation.
    IPSValidationHandler
    Base interface for a Schematron validation callback handler.
    SchematronValidationException
    Schematron exception that happens during validation.
  • Classes in com.helger.schematron.pure.validation used by com.helger.schematron.pure.bound.xpath 
    Class and Description
    IPSValidationHandler
    Base interface for a Schematron validation callback handler.
    SchematronValidationException
    Schematron exception that happens during validation.
  • Classes in com.helger.schematron.pure.validation used by com.helger.schematron.pure.validation 
    Class and Description
    AbstractPSPartialValidationHandler
    An extension of PSValidationHandlerDefault that is used to determine the overall validity of a Schematron validation.
    IPSValidationHandler
    Base interface for a Schematron validation callback handler.
    PSValidationHandlerDefault
    The empty default implementation of IPSValidationHandler.
    SchematronValidationException
    Schematron exception that happens during validation.
  • Classes in com.helger.schematron.pure.validation used by com.helger.schematron.pure.validation.xpath
